Recap: Destiny finally admits to Dani that she is pregnant from the one time she had sex with Matthew and now that they both know that Nate put Matthew in the hospital, Destiny tells Dani she mustn't let him get away with it. Bo and Nora know that the person who came to their house and assaulted their son has a gum wrapper which they are keeping for evidence although they cannot figure out who it would be. Nate secretly tells his brother that it's only a matter of time before Bo and Nora find out that he put Matthew in the hospital so he has to leave town in order to avoid a prison charge and he informs Robert that Rick "motivated" him and Deanna to do the porn flick by threatening to tell Matthew's parents what he knows if they refuse to do it. David finds out that Nate chews the gum in question although he is unaware that Nate assaulted Matthew. Bo discovers David chewing Nate's gum, asks where he found it and David tells him it's from the kid who got The Vicker Man erased by doing the porn flick.
Transcript: Kelly: Hello! We're home!
Dorian: Hi, honey. Welcome home.
Kelly: Thank you.
Dorian: Hello, Joe.
Joey: Dorian.
Dorian: How was your trip?
Kelly: Fantastic. Zane's camp show was awesome.
Joey: My nephew had the best song in the show.
Kelly: How was the premiere?
David: There was no premiere, Kelly.
Kelly: Oh, no! What happened? Did you have to cancel?
David: Oh, no.
Dorian: Oh, no. There was a viewing.
David: There was a viewing, all right!

Destiny: Is this true? "Hold the Diploma" starring Nate?
Dani: Yeah, unfortunately.
Destiny: You actually saw this hot mess?
Dani: Oh, yeah. All of it. Des, I can't believe this. It's like I don't know Nate at all.
Destiny: You don't. There's a lot more about Nate that you don't know.

Ford: Is this why you're hiding back here?

Nate: Did you come in here to cheer me up, 'cause it's not--
Ford: Nate, what were you thinking? If you needed cash, why didn't you just come talk to me?
Nate: I didn't do it for money. The director blackmailed us.

Bo: Can't believe that's happening today.
Nora: It was almost a year ago that Clint had David kidnapped, and then it all began.

Clint: They don't need to see their father carted off to jail.

Clint: Except Rex.

Rex: I'm definitely not that. Sorry I couldn't get you out last night.
Echo: Hey, lucky to be out at all. How did you and Shane get through the night?
Rex: He hung out with Roxy.

Rex: No. Gigi was here.

Dani: Yeah.

Dani: Oh, God.
Destiny: Nate knew Matthew killed his father. Do you think he could--

Ford: Then it wasn't your fault.
Nate: No, it was. That kind of injury--the person seems fine, but then a few hours later...
Ford: Why did you hit him?
Nate: I heard what he did, and I wanted him to pay.
Ford: For what?
Nate: He killed our dad.

Nora: Bo, I have to prosecute Clint for Eddie Ford's murder.

Nora: Then he recants.
Bo: What'll you do then?
Nora: What do you want me to say?

Clint: Doesn't change the fact that he's on a dark path. I know Rex doesn't want to hear advice from me, but I have seen what happens. I have lived what happens when there's nothing in your life but revenge. Shane just lost his mother. He now needs a father to take care of him.

Rex: No, I'd go another way.
Echo: I promise you won't have to compromise yourself to bail me out ever again.

Echo: Rex?
Rex: I almost committed murder last night.

Viki: No.

Viki: It matters to me.

Bo: Yes, he will.

Nora: So he comes home to have this normal life, and what do we do, we throw him in prison? Can you stand that? 'Cause I can't. I don't think I could make it through next week, let alone a whole lifetime with that. This is a question we haven't answered, Bo.
Bo: I know.
Nora: Could you do it? Could you throw our son in prison?
Bo: What if it's not up to us? Someone else knows the truth.
Nora: The person who hurt Matthew.

Nora: Yeah. The only thing we have to go on to figuring out who that person is is this. Any leads?
Bo: Not yet.
Nora: Yeah. So I think it's time that we accept the fact that we are never going to know who put Matthew where he is today.

Nate: Hard enough to make his brain bleed?

Nate: We thought that it would solve our problems. Deanna would get the file on her mother, and I would get Rick off my back.

Dorian: And I was too focused on our premiere to give Echo any thought.
Kelly: But now...

David: It's a lot better than you having to go back to the slammer. Hey, I've got a great idea. Why don't we take the DVD, go over to Bo and Step-Nora's, have a private premiere over there?
Dorian: I would love to spend time with the in-laws, but I just feel that that is an opportunity for you to have quality family time with them.

Dorian: You're rip-roaring hot anytime. I've got things to do.

Echo: I didn't know you had a gun.
Rex: It came with the house. Who knows. Clint's shotgun's probably around here somewhere. Might be a relief to a lot of people who don't know better.
Echo: What happened last night, Rex?
Rex: I had the TV on, not to watch it, just... anyway, it was the red carpet of the David Vickers movie.
Echo: That must have been good for a laugh.

Rex: Yeah, it was. Then Todd shows up on the red carpet with his whole family --Téa:, Blair, his kids. There Todd is, just grinning away with Jack. And then Blanca Morales asks them about Gigi. About how Jack was charged with the murder. And Todd--he just blows it off. He just blows it off, goes walking down the red carpet like it was nothing. So next thing I know, I grabbed the gun out of the safe and I'm at the premiere.
Echo: Wow. What did you do?

Rex: There they are, Todd and Jack in their tuxes with their perfect lives. Todd even gets to keep his ex-wife around. How fair is that? Everybody that Todd loves is around him. So I raised the gun, aiming it at Todd first.
Echo: Why didn't you shoot?
Rex: I got a text message from Shane.
Echo: What did he say?
Rex: Good night, and that he misses me. Then all I could think about is my son, my incredible son. Gigi's son. How I could kill Todd and his entire family, but then what would happen to Shane.
Echo: That's a good question.
Rex: Then I was thinking about everything that would have to happen next, how Bo would have to arrest me.
Echo: He'd hate that.

Rex: Believe me, I know what it's like to upset him. This would be so much worse. So the next thing I know is... I remember driving home in the car, and I'm having this conversation in my head with Gigi...chewing me out, yelling at me. I know exactly what she'd say.
Echo: What did she say?
Rex: "So sure, you would go ahead and kill all these people, his whole family. So what? It wouldn't bring me back. How could you do this to Shane. Balsom, what were you thinking?"
Echo: That sounds like Gigi to me. I'm glad you listened.
Rex: Me too.
Echo: You did the right thing, Rex. You know that, right?
Rex: I was so focused on revenge, I didn't have to think about anything else. Gigi's gone. She's not coming back. I just can't go on without her. What do I do?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dani: I don't know if I can tell Matthew's parents.

Destiny: So what? I have to protect "Mr. Exposed"?

Destiny: I don't know.

David: Pa. It would really mean a lot to me if you're the first person to see my movie.

Judge: The defendant will rise.
Higgins: Your honor, my client is recovering from a heart transplant.

Judge: Of course. You may stay seated, Mr. Buchanan. This could take a while. Mr. Buchanan, you are charged with the following crimes. In the matter of DNA tampering, you are charged with one count of burglary, two counts of forgery, two counts of tampering with records, two counts of fabricating physical evidence, and one count each of criminal conspiracy and criminal solicitation. In the matter of the abduction and incarceration of David Vickers Buchanan, you are charged with one count each of kidnapping, unlawful restraint, false imprisonment, criminal conspiracy, and criminal solicitation. Nora: Your honor, I would like to amend the indictment.

Nora: I'd like to remove a charge. The Commonwealth will no longer charge Clint Buchanan in the murder of Edward Ford.
Judge: District Attorney Buchanan, why not?
[SCENE_BREAK]
David: Ok, it's not movie premiere ambiance, but hey, at least we got food.
Bo: Yeah, well, I'm not hungry just yet.
David: All right. We can assess it for intermission, I guess. You at least want some gum?
[SCENE_BREAK]
Dani: Every time I close my eyes, I...see you and Deanna, 20 feet tall, doing it in front of everybody.

Dani: It doesn't make it go away, ok?
Nate: Can you ever forgive me?
Dani: I don't know.
Nate: What are you gonna tell the Buchanans?
Dani: I'm not telling. I don't want you to go to prison, Nate. No matter what, I'll never tell anyone what you did to Matthew.
[SCENE_BREAK]
Bo: David, where did you get this gum?
